title: Go for gold
creator_credit: Dick Durrance, Tom Hubbard and Crystal Productions
brief_description: An instructional film for the recreational racer. Former US Olympic coach Bob Beattie explains basic ski-racing techniques as pro-racers demonstrate ski preparation, the start, running the gates, and the finish. Accentuates key points in racing as pro-racers and top recreational skiers run the National Standard Race: NASTAR. Suitable for secondary and tertiary levels.
